story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Columbia Entertainment, a vehicle used by owners of hotel investment firm Columbia Sussex Corp., said on Wednesday it completed its purchase of Aztar Corp. AZR.N, the owner of Las Vegas's Tropicana casino, for about $2.1 billion. The acquisition, agreed to by the companies in May, has been approved by gaming authorities in Nevada, New Jersey and Indiana, Columbia said.
story.title: columbia entertainment closes $ 2 . 1 bln aztar deal
